response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you, worth $1,200,000 based on your assessment. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a strategic price of $1,150,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its perceived value and offers you an excellent chance to secure it before considering alternative options. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition that respects both our interests. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions regarding the product or the offer.", "product_price": 1150000}
